chapter.text: Uspishnyy diysno yavlyayutʹ soboyu viruyuchiv
khto ye shanoblyvyy pid chas yikhnikh Kontaktnykh Molytv (Salat)
Ta vony unykayutʹ marnoyi rozmovy
Ta vony dayutʹ yikhnyu obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat)
Ta vony pidtrymuyutʹ yikhniy chastity
Tilʹky z yikhnim podruzhzhyam, abo tsey khto ye zakonno yikhniy, roblyatʹ vony mayutʹ stattyevi vidnoshennya; vony ne musyatʹ buty osudzheni
Tsey khto porushuyutʹ tsi mezhi yavlyayutʹ soboyu porushnykiv
Koly yomu prybuvaye deponuye dovirenyy yim, tak zhe, yak i budʹ-yaki dohovory vony roblyatʹ, vony ye dostovirni
Ta vony zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) rehulyarno
Takyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu inheritors
Vony uspadkuyutʹ Ray, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy buduchy z pevnoho riznovydu hryazyuky
Z·hodom, my vidtvoryly yoho z tiny krapli, shcho rozmishchuyetʹsya u dobre zakhyshchenyy sklad

Todi my rozrobyly kraplyu u vishayuchu (embryo), todi rozvyvalysya vishayuchyy (embryo) u ukus-velychyna (fetus), todi utvoryly ukus-velychyna (fetus) u kistky, todi nakryly kistky z m'yasom. My takym chynom vyroblyayemo novyy vytvir. Naybilʹsh blahoslovlenyy BOH, krashchyy Creator
Todi, piznishe, vy vmyrayete
Todi, na Dni Resurrection, vy budete resurrected
My stvoryuvaly nad vamy sim vsesvitu u verstvakh, ta my nikoly ne unaware yedynoho vytvoru u nykh
My posylayemo vnyz z neba voda, u tochniy miri, todi my zberihayemo tse u zemli. Zvychayno, my mozhemo dozvolyty tse vtecha
Z tse, my vyroblyayemo dlya vas fruktovi sady palʹm daty, vynohradu, vsikh riznovydiv fruktiv, ta riznomanitnykh produktiv kharchuvannya
Takozh, derevo urodzhenetsʹ Sinai vyroblyaye naftu, tak zhe, yak i relish dlya eaters

Ta domashna khudoba musytʹ zabezpechyty vas z urokom. My dozvolyayemo vy p'yete (moloko) z yikhnikh shlunkiv, vy oderzhuyete inshyy maye vyhodu z nykh, ta deyakykh z nykh vy vykorystovuyete dlya prodovolʹstva
Na nykh, ta na korabli, vy yidete
My poslaly Noah do yoho lyudey, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, obozhnyuyutʹ BOHA. Vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvyy

lidery shcho disbelieved sered yoho lyudey skazaly, "Tse ne vyhlyadaye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki yak vy, khto zakhoche otrymaty prominence sered vas. BOH willed, Vin mih poslaly vnyz anhely. My nikoly ne pochuly budʹ shcho lyubymo tse z nashykh predkiv
Vin znyknutʹ prosto lyudyna bozhevilʹna. Tilʹky ihnoruvaty yoho dlya deyakoho chasu
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni peremoha, dlya vony disbelieved meni

My todi nadykhnuly yoho: "Zrobitʹ watercraft pid nashymy watchful ochamy, ta z·hidno z nashym natkhnennyam. Koly nasha komanda prybuvaye, ta naryvy atmosfery, uvimkayutʹ tse para kozhnoho riznovydu (vashoho domesticated tvaryny), ta vasha rodyna, krim tsykh zasudzhenoyi shchob pryrikatysya. Ne rozmovlyayte z Meni vid imeni tsykh khto porushyly; vony budutʹ tonutysya
Odnoho "razu vy ulahodzhuyetesʹ, razom z tsymy khto z vamy, na watercraft, vy budete skazaty, `praise BOH dlya toho, shchob ryatuvaty nas z z·hubnykh lyudey
Ta kazhutʹ, `my Lord, dozvolenyy meni disembark na blahoslovenne roztashuvannya; Vy yavlyayete soboyu krashchyy deliverer
Tsey musyte zabezpechyty dostatni dokazy dlya vas. My zvychayno postavymo vas do testu
Z·hodom, my vstanovyly inshu heneratsiyu pislya nykh
My poslaly yim kur'yer z chysla yim, kazhuchy, "Vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA. Vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvyy

lidery sered yoho lyudey shcho disbelieved ta vidkhylyly ideyu U maybutnʹomu - khocha my yakshcho dlya nykh velykodushno u tsʹomu zhytti - skazaly, "Tse ne ye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuche yak vy. Vin hostytʹsya z shcho vy hostytesya, ta napiy tomu shcho vy p'yete
Yakshcho vy pidkoryayetesya lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchym yak vy, todi vy diysno losers
vin obitsyaye vam shcho, pislya vy vmyraye ta obih u pyl ta kistky, vy vyydete znov
Nemozhlyvo, nemozhlyvo diysno shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas
My tilʹky zhyvemo tse zhyttya - my zhyvemo ta vmyrayemo - ta my budemo nikoly resurrected
Vin ye tilʹky lyudyna kotra vyhotovyla brekhnyu ta prypysala yim do BOHA. My nikoly ne povirymo yomu
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni peremoha, dlya vony disbelieved meni
Vin skazav, "Skoro vony budutʹ zasmucheni
retribution ukladeni yim, equitably, ta otzhe, my povernuly yikh u ruyiny. Bezputni lyudy zahynuly
Z·hodom, my vstanovyly inshi heneratsiyi pislya nykh
Niyaka spilʹnota ne mozhe prosunutysya yoho predetermined dolya, ne zatrymuyutʹ tse

Todi my poslaly nashym kur'yeram pidryad. Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav do yoho spilʹnoty, vony disbelieved yo. Otzhe, my vynyshchyly yikh, pislya inshyy, ta zroblenoho yim istoriyu. Lyudy shcho disbelieved zahynuly
Todi my poslaly Moses ta yoho brat Aaron z nashymy vidkryttyamy ta hlybokym dokazom
Pharaoh ta yoho elders, ale vony povernulysya zukhvali. Vony buly hnityuchi lyudy
Vony skazaly, my 'Budemo poviryty dlya dvokh lyudey chyyi lyudy ye nashi raby
Vony vidkhylyly dva, ta otzhe, vony buly vynyshcheni
My daly Moses svyate pysannya, shcho vony mozhutʹ keruvatysya
My zrobyly synu Mary ta yoho materi znak, ta my daly yim prytulok na mesa z prodovolʹstvom ta napoyim
O vy kur'yery, hostyatʹsya z harnykh umov, ta roboty righteousness. YA znayu tsilkom vse vy
Takyy ne zmozhu vash congregation odyn congregation - ta ya ye vash Lord; vy budete povaha Meni
Ale vony rozirvaly sebe u dysputuyuchi fraktsiyu; kozhna storona shchaslyva z yaki vony
Tomu, tilʹky lyshayutʹ yikh u yikhnʹomu zamishanni, dlya deyakoho chasu
Roblyatʹ vony dumayutʹ shcho, z my yakshcho yim z hroshamy ta ditʹmy
my obov'yazok showering yim z blahoslovennyam? Diysno, vony ne mayutʹ ideyi
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto ye shanoblyvo svidomyy yikhnʹoho Lorda
Ta khto viryatʹ v apokalipsysu yikhnʹoho Lorda
Ta khto nikoly ne vstanovlyuvav budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya yikhnʹoho Lorda
Tomu shcho vony dayutʹ yikhni dobrodiynistʹ, yikhni serdenʹka ye tsilkom shanoblyvi. Dlya vony vyznayutʹ shcho vony budutʹ sklykatysya pered tym, yak yikhniy Lord
Vony ye neterplyachi zrobyty spravedlyvi pratsi; vony konkuruyutʹ u roblyachykh yim
My nikoly tyahar budʹ-yaka dusha poza yoho zasobamy, ta my ne derzhymo zapys shcho vymovlyaye pravdu. Niyakyy kozhnyy ne zaznaye nespravedlyvosti
Tomu, shcho yikhni rozum ye oblivious do tse, vony zdiysnyuyutʹ pratsi shcho ne prystosovuyutʹsya z tse; yikhni pratsi zlo
Todi, koly my requite yikhni lidery z retribution, vony skarzhatʹsya
Ne skarzhatʹsya zaraz; vy vidmovylysya vid vsiyeyi dopomohy z nas
Moyi dokazy buly predstavleni do vas, ale vy povernulysya nazad na vashykh p'yatakh
Vy buly nadto zukhvali vyznaty yikh, ta vy defiantly disregarded yim
Chomu vony ne viddzerkalyuyutʹ na tse svyate pysannya? Vony ne zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho vony otrymaly shchosʹ nikoly ne dosyahnute yikhnimy predkamy
vony vyyshly z ladu vyznaty yikhnʹoho kur'yera? Tse chomu vony disregarding yo
vony vyrishyly shcho vin ye bozhevilʹnyy? Diysno, vin prynis pravdu yim, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh nenavydyatʹ pravdu
Diysno, yakshcho b pravda prystosuvalasya do yikhnikh bazhanʹ, tam by bula khaos u nebi ta zemli; vse u nykh bulo by korumpovane. My daly yim yikhniy dokaz, ale vony disregarding yikhniy dokaz
vy prosyte yikh dlya zarplaty? Vasha zarplata Lorda daleko krashche. Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho Provaydera
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy zaproshuyete yikh do pryamoho shlyakhu
Tsey khto disbelieve u U maybutnʹomu bude bezsumnivno deviate z prava shlyakh
Rivni koly my showered yim z myloserdyam, ta relieved yikhni problemy, vony porynuly bilʹsh hlyboki u porushennya, ta prodovzhuvalysʹ do pomylky
Rivni koly my afflicted yim z retribution, vony nikoly ne povernulysya do yikhnʹoho blahayuchykh Lordom
Z·hodom, koly my requited yim z suvorym retribution vony pidpaly, vony buly shokovani
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto harantuvav vam slukhannya, zir, ta mizky. Ridko vy appreciative
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vstanovyv vas na zemli, ta pered tym, yak Yo vy budete sklykatysya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto kontrolyuye zhyttya ta smertʹ, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnikh kotrykh zastupnykiv nich ta denʹ. Vy ne rozumiyete
Vony skazaly shcho yikhni predky skazaly
Vony skazaly, "Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom ta kistkamy, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
Taki obitsyanky davalysʹ nam ta do nashykh batʹkiv ranishe. Tse - ni bilʹsh nizh povisti z mynuli
Kazhete, "Komu nalezhytʹ zemli ta kozhnomu na tse, yakshcho vy znayete
Vony skazhutʹ, "Do BOHA." Skazhitʹ, "Chomu todi vy ne berete uvahu
Kazhutʹ, "Khto yavlyaye soboyu Lorda semy vsesvitu; Lord velykoho dominion
Vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Skazhitʹ, "Chomu todi vy ne povertayete spravedlyvyy

Kazhutʹ, "U chyyiy rutsi vesʹ suverenitet vsi rechi, ta Vin zakinchuyetʹsya yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky odyn khto mozhe zabezpechyty dopomohu, ale zakinchuyetʹsya potreby ni dopomoha, yakshcho vy ne zakinchuyetʹsya znayete
Vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Skazhitʹ, "De vy poyikhaly nepravylʹni
My daly yim pravdu, v toy chas, yak vony brekhuny

BOH nikoly ne begotten syn. Ne buv tam kolysʹ budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh bilya Yoho. Inakshe, kozhnyy boh by zayavyv nezalezhnistʹ z yoho stvorennyam, ta vony by konkuruvaly z odyn odnoho dlya dominance. BOH glorified; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy; Vin exalted, daleko nahori mayuchyy partner
Kazhete, "Miy Lord, Vy pokazuyete chy meni (retribution) vony pidpaly
Miy Lord, dozvolenyy meni ne budutʹ odyn z porushuyuchykh lyudey
Shchob pokazaty vam (retribution) my zarezervovani dlya nykh shchosʹ my mozhemo lehko zrobyty
Tomu, protylezhne yikhnye zlo pratsi z dobrotoyu; my znayemo tsilkom yikhni pretenziyi
Kazhu, "Miy Lord, ya shukayu prytulku u Vas z shepotu chortiv
Ta ya shukayu prytulku u Vas, miy Lord, lest vony prybuvayutʹ bilya meni
Koly smertʹ prybuvaye do odyn z nykh, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord, posylayutʹ meni nazad
ya todi popratsyuyu righteousness u vse ya lyshav." Ne virnyy. Tse ye nevirna pretenziya shcho vin robytʹ. Bar'yer vidokremytʹ yoho dushu z tsʹoho svitu do resurrection
Koly rih duyetʹsya, niyaki vidnoshennya sered nykh ne budutʹ isnuvaty na shcho denʹ, ne bude vony pikluyutʹsya pro odyn odnym
Yak dlya tsykh chyyikh tyahariv ye vazhki, vony budutʹ peremozhtsi
Tsi chyyi tyahari svitlo yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri zahubylo yikhni dushi; vony perebuyutʹ u Pekli zavzhdy
Vohonʹ bude overwhelm yikhni oblychchya, ta vony ostanni miserably tam
ne Moyi vidkryttya deklamuvalysʹ do vas, ta vy derzhalysʹ na vidkhylyayuchykh yim
Vony skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, nash wickedness overwhelmed ny, ta my lyudy zablukalysya
Nash Lord, berutʹ nas z tse; yakshcho my vertayemo (do nashoyi staroyi povedinky), todi my ye diysno bezputni
Vin skazhe, "Perebuyutʹ tam, prynyzyv, ta ne rozmovlyayutʹ z Meni
hrupa Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv zvychayno kazala, `our Lord, my poviryly, tak probachayemo nam ta nam zlyvy z myloserdyam. Vsikh myloserdnykh, Vy yavlyayete soboyu Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Ale vy vysmiyaly ta ridiculed yim, v obsyazi shcho vy zabuly Meni. Vy zvychayno smiyalysya z nykh
ya nahorodyv yikh sʹohodni, v obmin na yikhniy steadfastness, roblyachy yim peremozhtsi
Vin skazav, "Yak dovhi vy vytrymaly na zemli? Skilʹky rokiv
Vony skazaly, "My vytrymaly denʹ abo chastynu dnya. Poprositʹ tsi khto rozrakhuvaly
Vin skazav, "Faktychno, vy zalyshylysya ale rezyume tymchasove, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Zrobyly vy dumayete shcho my utvoryly vas marno; shcho vy ne musyte buty povernuti do nas
Naybilʹsh exalted BOH, virnyy Suverennyy. Nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho; naybilʹshyy Pochesnyy Lord, possessor vsʹoho avtorytetu
Budʹ khto khto idolizes bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh, ta bez budʹ-yakoho riznovydu dokazu, yoho rozrakhunok vidpochyvaye z yoho Lordom. disbelievers nikoly ne mayutʹ uspikh
Kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, ny zlyvy z forgiveness ta myloserdyam. Vsikh myloserdnykh, Vy yavlyayete soboyu Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
